gw.bc.account.entity

Interface PolicyCommission

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, Editable, IGosuObject, InCurrencySilo, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.InCurrencySiloStubI, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, com.guidewire.bc.domain.account.gen.PolicyCommissionStubI, Retireable, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, TAccountOwner, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.TAccountOwnerStubI, Versionable

    public interface PolicyCommission
extends com.guidewire.bc.domain.account.gen.PolicyCommissionStubI
    PolicyCommission A relationship between a policy and a producer code

      void writeOffCommissionRecovery(MonetaryAmount amountToWriteOff)
      Scriptable function Writes off commission recovery by giving the producer associated with this policy producer code a bonus of the specified amount, and then pulling negative payable balance from the associated ProducerCode and this PolicyProducerCode and it's children PolicyProducerCodeCharges to match the bonus.
      void writeOffCommissionReserve()
      Writes off any remaining commission reserved for this policy producer code's charges.

    • Field Detail

      • CREATEDATE_ORDERING

        static final com.google.common.collect.Ordering<PolicyCommission> CREATEDATE_ORDERING

    • Method Detail

      • refreshCommissionEarnings

        void refreshCommissionEarnings()
        Loops across all ItemCommissions connected to this PolicyCommission, and triggers re-calculation of commission earnings. Also recalculates commission earnings at the PolicyCommission level. NOTE: Calling this method could create many transactions, and should typically only be done in the rare instance that commission has somehow become "stuck" in Commission Reserve for this PolicyCommission. It is not recommended for this method to be used externally in normal operations.

      • getCommissionRate

        @Nullable
com.guidewire.bc.util.Percentage getCommissionRate(Charge charge)
        Gets the rate at which the given charge is commissioned for this PolicyCommission.
        Parameters:
        charge - the related charge, if any
        Returns:
        the commission rate for the charge. Returns null if the charge is not commissionable at all.

      • calculateCommissionBasis

        MonetaryAmount calculateCommissionBasis()
        Calculates the commission basis for this PolicyCommission.

      • getCommissionPayableBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionPayableBalance()
        Gets the current balance of the "Commissions Payable" T-Account for the producer code for this policy.

      • getCommissionExpenseBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionExpenseBalance()
        Gets the current balance of the "Commissions Expense" T-Account for the producer code for this policy.

      • getPositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance

        MonetaryAmount getPositiveCmsnAdjustmentBalance()
        Returns the balance of the PositiveCmsnAdjustment expense t-account - represents the expense incurred by adjusting the amount of commission paid to a producer upwards. The balance is the sum of the "PositiveCmsnAdjustment" balances for all the ChargeCommissions associated with this PolicyCommission

      • getNegativeCmsnAdjustmentBalance

        MonetaryAmount getNegativeCmsnAdjustmentBalance()
        Returns the balance of the NegativeCmsnAdjustment income t-account - represents the income received by adjusting the amount of commission paid to a producer downwards. The balance is the sum of the "NegativeCmsnAdjustment" balances for all the ChargeCommissions associated with this PolicyCommission

      • getCommissionReserveBalance

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionReserveBalance()
        Gets the total commission in reserve for this policy producer code. This is equal to the sum of the commission reserves on the policy producer code itself, and all of its commissionable ChargeCommissions.

      • getCommissionPaid

        MonetaryAmount getCommissionPaid()
        Gets the current amount of commission paid to the producer code for this policy. This is equivalent to "Commission Expense" - ("Commission Reserve" + "Commission Payable").

      • writeOffCommissionRecovery

        void writeOffCommissionRecovery(MonetaryAmount amountToWriteOff)
        Scriptable function Writes off commission recovery by giving the producer associated with this policy producer code a bonus of the specified amount, and then pulling negative payable balance from the associated ProducerCode and this PolicyProducerCode and it's children PolicyProducerCodeCharges to match the bonus.

      • writeOffCommissionReserve

        void writeOffCommissionReserve()
        Writes off any remaining commission reserved for this policy producer code's charges. For each charge, the Commission Reserve T-Account is reduced to 0, and the Negative Commission Write-Off income T-Account is increased by the same amount. Does nothing if the Commission Reserve balance is not positive.

      • getCommissionRateAsBigDecimal

        @Nullable
java.math.BigDecimal getCommissionRateAsBigDecimal(Charge charge)
        Gets the rate at which the given charge is commissioned for this PolicyCommission.
        Parameters:
        charge - the related charge, if any
        Returns:
        the commission rate for the charge. Returns null if the charge is not commissionable at all.

      • isPrimary

        boolean isPrimary()
        Returns:
        true if the role for this policy commission is Primary
